Perioperative Integration

If your hospital uses both Anesthesia Manager or PACU Manager with OR Manager, certain parameters must be set to allow the applications to work together. When perioperative integration is configured, Preop Manager, OR Manager and Anesthesia and PACU Manager will share certain data such as:

l Demographics

l Diagnoses and planned procedures

l Anesthesiologist and surgeon name

l Allergies and precautions

l Surgery date

l Milestone events
